channel.title: CVE Feed for Recipes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Recipes -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0403|2024-08-28T19:00:21.460Z -- recipes -- recipes
item.description:
Recipes version 1.5.10 allows arbitrary HTTP requests to be made
through the server. This is possible because the application is
vulnerable to SSRF.
